# from pyteomics import mzml

try:
    import pyopenms

[docs]class Reader(object):
    
    def __init__(self, fname):
        
        self.fname = fname
        

[docs]    def read_mzml(self):
        
        self.fil = pyopenms.MzMLFile()
        self.exp = pyopenms.MSExperiment()
        self.fil.load(self.fname, self.exp)
